text: Pachi parekaharu rasulullaha(sallallaho alaihe vasallama) ga'isakepascata aphu basirakhnuma khusi chan. Uniharule allahako margama aphna mala ra aphno jyanaharusita jihada garna ruca'enan ra uniharule bhane ki yasa garmima naniska. Bhanidinus ki narkako ago sahrai nai garama cha. Yiniharule yo kura bujheko bha'e kati ramro hune thiyo
